review: Dr Smitha has very **** ********* *** ** **** experienced. I went to dr smitha first for NT scan and now for TIFFA. Doctor made me comfortable during the scan. Explained everything about first trimester screening in detail during nt scan. Showed me all the babies parts during tiffa scan. She is very approachable and We need more doctors like this. Doctor answered all my questions with a lot of patience. Thank you Dr Smitha. Keep doing the good work !

Very kind and friendly,I would recommend this to others,
I was able resolve my issues,I would like to prefer her to be my family doctor

review: Dr. Smitha was very friendly. She has helped us through out our pregnancy and delivery. Explained the exact problem in scans,clarified all out douts with lot of patience and gentle smile. We are extremely happy with the treatment Dr.Smitha has given. Highly recommend her.
